method.text: Carefully remove the very top and bottom of the pineapple. Cut into slices widthways - one slice per person.
Mix together the melted butter, honey and rum. Score each pineapple with a sharp knife in a criss-cross pattern.
Place on the barbecue and brush over the melted mixture.
Cook on one side for 3-5 min then turn over.
Divide the raspberries between the slices and baste again.
Cook for a further 3-5 min or until soft and caramelised.
Serve immediately with a spoonful of fromage frais on each slice.
